text: Blasted Hell () is a 1967 Soviet action movie directed by Ivan Lukinsky.В "Москино" бесплатно покажут фильмы об узниках концлагерейВЗОРВАННЫЙ АД It stars Gennadiy Bortnikov, Nikolai Skorobogatov, and Imedo Kakhiani. == Actors == * Gennadiy Bortnikov as Nikolay Berezhnikov * Nikolai Skorobogatov as Lifanov (as N. Skorobogatov) * Imedo Kakhiani as Archil Tatishvili (as I. Kakhiani) * Aleksandr Novikov as Mandrykin (as A. Novikov) * Sergey Yakovlev as Ivan Besavkin (as S. Yakovlev) * Olev Eskola as Anberg (as O. Eskola) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1967 action movies Category:Soviet action movies Category:Movies directed by Ivan Lukinsky
title: Blasted Hell
